title: BBC Smack in Suburbia Americas Heroin Crisis 720p x264 AAC MVGro
description:
Smack in Suburbia: Americas Heroin Crisis

Health-Medical Documentary hosted by India Rakusen, published by BBC in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/8/86/Smack-in-Suburbia-Americas-Heroin-Crisis-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Smack in Suburbia: America's Heroin Crisis
With the United States in the midst of a heroin and opiate epidemic, India Rakusen travels to the state of Ohio, where addiction has become part of everyday life.
West of Cleveland, Avon Lake is a wealthy suburb - large, expensive properties with white picket fences back onto the shores of Lake Eerie. But behind this faÃ§ade, there is a crisis. Young people are dying from overdoses at an alarming rate. Many families have felt the damaging impact of addiction; and across Lorain County, opiates - pharmaceutical and street heroin - have killed twice as many people in the first six months of 2016 as died in the whole of 2015.
